entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
